main event: A cigar-shaped and round object was observed in the sky over Chanute AFB, Illinois on March 19, 1962.
interesting points: The object was orange in color and about one-fifth the size of the sun.
The object changed shape, appearing cigar-shaped at times and round at other times.
The object was observed to hover, move laterally, and move vertically.
The object gave the impression of moving vertically from top to bottom.
The sighting was made by multiple reliable witnesses, including a pilot and air police personnel.
witnesses: Capt. T.E. Wood, Pilot, Hospital; ASC H.R. Schenc, Air Police Sq; ASC L. Rinehart, Air Police Sq
